about_the_game:
Dive into the whimsical universe of Fight'N'Jokes with an episodic 3D story adventure, unveiling the hidden tales of beloved characters on their journey to an iconic tournament. No prior knowledge of the universe is required!

The narrative of the first episode unfolds in Miopinja's hometown, a quaint fishing village once home to mighty ninja warriors and now the guardian family's youngest man. Dark forces invade, seeking a powerful artifact hidden within the village. Faced with the calamity of his failure to protect it, Miopinja, clad in his family's traditional ninja attire, embarks on a quest to investigate and confront the ghostly figures threatening his home.

Join Miopinja on this light-hearted comedic adventure, learning more about your favorite heroes through their everyday lives, filled with whimsical encounters and quirky wonders.

Key Features:

  • Episodic Adventure: Experience the story in episodes, each diving deep into the backstories of iconic characters from the Fight'N'Jokes universe.

  • Quaint Village Life: Explore Miopinja’s hometown, rich in history and mystery, where every corner holds a story.

  • Interactive Storytelling: Make choices that influence the narrative, shaping Miopinja's journey and the fate of the village.

  • Whimsical Encounters: Engage with a cast of quirky characters, each with their own unique stories and challenges.

  • Puzzle Solving: Unravel puzzles and uncover secrets hidden within the village and beyond.

  • Humor and Heart: A game filled with light-hearted humor, where jokes might just be the key to saving the world.

name: Fight'N'Jokes: Storylines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.2GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Dive into 'Fight'N'Jokes: Storylines', an episodic 3D adventure game where puzzles, quick-time events, and rich dialogues bring the story to life. Explore the lives of iconic characters, make impactful choices, resolve conflicts, make new friends, and rise to become the true champion of the realm.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, German
*languages with full audio support
